Longsword Animset Pro
---------------------

Textures configured for "Linear" color space. Switch the color space to "Linear" in Edit\ProjectSettings\Player tab.

---------------------
All net income from sales of this pack goes to charity, specifically to Bogdani Family Hematology Foundation: http://www.fundacjabogdani.pl/en/Homepage

By buying this pack you not only get a character and animations for your game - you also directly help saving lives of people who can't afford treatment. If you got this pack from other place than Unity Asset Store, please reconsider buying a legal license.

---------------------
Kubold
www.kubold.com
